metadata.title: CVE-2019-13045 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Irssi before 1.0.8, 1.1.x before 1.1.3, and 1.2.x before 1.2.1, when SASLis enabled, has a use after free when sending SASL login to the server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 1.0.5-1ubuntu4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.5-1ubuntu4.2').
